io.debezium.heartbeat

Interface Heartbeat


  • public interface Heartbeat
    A class that is able to generate periodic heartbeat messages based on a pre-configured interval. The clients are supposed to call method heartbeat(Consumer) from a main loop of a connector.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Field HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL 
      static Field HEARTBEAT_TOPICS_PREFIX 
      static Heartbeat NULL
      No-op Heartbeat implementation
